Designs.Description:
ZORALab's Hestia heavily rely on CSS to style this component and offering its
css variables for customizations. Below are the list of available CSS variables
at your disposal.
Designs.Title: CSS

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : .2rem .5rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-border
CSS PROPERTY : border
DEFAULT      : none (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-border-radius
CSS PROPERTY : border-radius
DEFAULT      : .8rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border radius of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border Radius

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-width-shine
CSS PROPERTY : width
DEFAULT      : .6rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the shining ray's width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Shining Ray Width

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-font-size
CSS PROPERTY : font-size
DEFAULT      : 18px (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the font size of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Font Size

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : #fafafa (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-color-shine
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : #ffff27 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the shining ray's color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Shining Ray Color

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-color-print
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : #101010 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component during print mode.
Designs.Title: Color (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-background
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : #0000d1 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the background of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Background

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-background-print
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : #fff (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the background of the rendered component during print mode.
Designs.Title: Background (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-transition
CSS PROPERTY : transition
DEFAULT      : 1.3s (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the animation timing of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Transition

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-title-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : #fafafa (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the title color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Title Color

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-title-background
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : #585858 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the title background of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Title Background

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --badge-value-font-weight
CSS PROPERTY : font-weight
DEFAULT      : 800 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the value's font family of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Value Font Weight
